name: lifeops
description: LifeOps monorepo: NestJS + Prisma + Postgres backend, Next.js + Tailwind + Three.js frontend

scripts.dev: concurrently -n backend,frontend -c blue,green "npm run -w apps/backend start:dev" "npm run -w apps/frontend dev"
scripts.build: npm run -w apps/backend build && npm run -w apps/frontend build
scripts.start: concurrently -n backend,frontend -c blue,green "npm run -w apps/backend start:prod" "npm run -w apps/frontend start"
